titleStmt.title: The last will and testament of Superstition: eldest daughter to Antichrist, the eldest sonne to Lucifer, the prince of this world, of the family of popery, in the kingdome of idolatry: being fallen into a grievous fit of sicknesse, without all hopes of recovery. Made in the prelates clymactericall yeer, Anno Domini. 1641.
titleStmt.author: I. B., Gent.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Per I. B. gent.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
